scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../app && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: docker compose --env-file ./config/environment-variables/.env.docker.dev -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker image prune -f && docker exec db ./docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sh && cd app && npm run start
scripts.backend:dev: docker compose --env-file ./config/environment-variables/.env.docker.dev -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && && docker image prune -f && docker exec db ./docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sh
scripts.backend: docker compose --env-file ./config/environment-variables/.env.docker.dev -f ./docker/docker-compose.prod.yml -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker exec db ./docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sh
scripts.seed: cd backend && npx prisma db push && npx prisma db push --schema ./prisma/psql.prisma && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:generate: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma/psql.prisma
